data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Gaza to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gaza, Palestina
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, 487,900 people live in the state of Gaza. Please, give them 97 new simple churches this year.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 33 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Gaza access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Gaza who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people.
Father, remind your church in Gaza that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Gaza, Palestina.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Gaza, Palestina.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
